originalText.text: This office has helped my career and my journey of becoming a Marine a lot. With the help of Ssgt Velasquez with the whole process of studying for the ASVAB exam and making sure I am all good for the physical. I was able to score high on the exam and with all the help and effort from my recruiter I was able to get through the whole process. As a Poolee I was very much motivated to come to PT every Tuesdays and Thursdays, there was a lot of workouts that we did in this office that helped with getting prepared as best as I could for basic. Once I became a Marine, I really feel that I am learning a lot on how to be the best possible Marine I can be due to the recruiters in this office.

text.text: This office has helped my career and my journey of becoming a Marine a lot. With the help of Ssgt Velasquez with the whole process of studying for the ASVAB exam and making sure I am all good for the physical. I was able to score high on the exam and with all the help and effort from my recruiter I was able to get through the whole process. As a Poolee I was very much motivated to come to PT every Tuesdays and Thursdays, there was a lot of workouts that we did in this office that helped with getting prepared as best as I could for basic. Once I became a Marine, I really feel that I am learning a lot on how to be the best possible Marine I can be due to the recruiters in this office.

originalText.text:
Without this office and the Marines, I would not be the somebody I am today. These Marines are the best kinds of people I have met and we do not have that many left out here . They will push you past your limits to be able to better yourself as a person. They will do everything in their power to make sure you get to where you want to be. They welcome everybody with open arms and treat you like family, they will never shut down what you want to get out of life.
My recruiter was Staff Sergeant Mendoza and he has made sure that I was be able to complete my transformation from a civilian to a Marine. He has pushed me to points where I didn’t know I can go myself and has motivated me to be able to do this process. They all have supported me in my journey of becoming the best of the best, a United States Marine, and I will never forget them.

originalText.text: I had an amazing experience at this office. I was so pleased with the attentiveness I received here. They went above and beyond to help me become a United States marine. I was very impressed and shocked by the way they motivate and support each and everyone. The  environment is very positive and motivational; in order to become the best version of yourself. They will push you to your limits but it just makes you feel more  confident with yourself. Any questions I had they could answer and provide extensive knowledge about the topic and also have different perspectives of several topics. Also they help you achieve your goals faster and efficiently. My recruiter was SSGT Velasquez he was able to provide me information about jobs and different paths I can take to achieve my goals that I didn’t know even existed. He also was able to help me pick  specific job field. They build bonds with us because they care about us and our future.

originalText.text: I've had an amazing experience in this office. My recruiter Sgt shaw was supportive and informative through the whole process while providing me with the best resources. They will push you past your limits to be able to better yourself as a person. And with that I was able to be completely transformed into a marine.

text.text: I've had an amazing experience in this office. My recruiter Sgt shaw was supportive and informative through the whole process while providing me with the best resources. They will push you past your limits to be able to better yourself as a person. And with that I was able to be completely transformed into a marine.

originalText.text: Recruiters were highly friendly, very calm area helped me get through the process of becoming a United States Marine, they helped me change my life in ways I never thought were possible, they helped me look at jobs and never gave up on me even when I was about to give up myself. They shipped me and helped me get through every process. Whenever I had a question they had an answer and when they didn’t they found out as quick as possible, I owe so much to them and although I don’t show it I am grateful for my recruiters at RSS Gotham
